item.title: Getting Started With Ansible(Part-2)
item.description: Ansible Inventory Management An inventory is a list of hosts that Ansible manages Inventory location may be specified as follows a) Default:/etc/ansible/hosts b) Specified by CLI using -i flag c) Can be set in ansible.
